page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE 4
page.content: It was one of those days in my life when i could'nt be bothered to get up. My mam had to call me about 10 times. I got out of bed . Then i got washed and went down stairs and had my breakfast. After that i just layed on the sofa. Then at 8a.m my mam told me off for being lazy. I got up and started to get dressed, i wore my blue skirt with my white blouse. At half past eight Julie came to our house. She said that we were doing the Domesday project at school. At 8.40 we left our house, and on the way I met Fiona. When we got to school Mr. Pearson, our teacher, told us to get our reading books out, which was boring. After that we did our Friday test, which I scored 40 out of 50 on.
